/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the serene atmosphere of the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, where nature and architecture coexist harmoniously.
